meanings.definition: A person who rides waves without the use of a surfboard.
meanings.sent1: The bodysurfer gracefully rode the wave with just their body.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bodysurfer catching a wave at the beach yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The bodysurfer's dance with the waves was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Like a dolphin, the bodysurfer glided through the water effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The bodysurfer's connection with the ocean was truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: To ride waves without the use of a surfboard.
meanings.sent1: I want to bodysurf in the ocean this weekend.
meanings.sent2: She bodysurfs every summer when the waves are good.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to bodysurf instead of using surfboards for fun.
meanings.sent4: As the waves crashed, he bodysurfed back to shore with excitement.
meanings.sent5: Bodysurfing allows you to feel the power of the ocean firsthand.
